10 Reasons Why Internal Campus Communications Are So Difficult 
Inside Higher Ed: 10 reasons why our efforts at internal campus communications are falling short:#1. Message Saturation:There are already too many campus messages. We operate in a marketplace of ideas, and the supply of ideas is outstripping demand. We have a glut of ideas, a glut of messages, and a glut of communications. How many groups and people on your campus are vying for your attention? How many events can you attend? How many messages can you absorb and process?
